description:
An innovative inflatable PFD that changes the rules of the game. The low-profile design offers 8 pounds of flotation for neutral buoyancy. If you hit the water, you can just re-board and carry on paddling. In emergency situations, trigger a manual inflation cell to fill the air bladders in the chest and upper back panels, and get a healthy 22 pounds of total buoyancy without having to re-jig the straps or make any complex adjustments. Great for stand up paddleboarding or paddlers who are comfortable with self-rescue and find it easier without a bulky PFD.

  • Low-profile design is lightweight, maximizes range of motion and facilitates re-entry if you capsize
  • Foam panels provide 8 pounds of flotation to provide neutral buoyancy if you go in
  • Manually-triggered inflator adds more than 14 pounds of additional buoyancy
  • Comfortable mesh inner back panel helps manage moisture
  • Adjustable shoulder and side straps allow you to optimize fit
  • High visibility panels on shoulder straps, with attachment points for a rescue knife or strobe light
  • Accommodates chest sizes from 30 to 52 inches
  • Minimum user weight of 90 pounds
  • Outer material is stretch spandex, which allows inflatable cells to expands and provides a comfortable stretch fit
  • Includes CO2 cylinder. Re-arm kit G sold separately
  • Inflatable PFDs must be worn on your person to be legal (no stowing them in your boat or on your board) and are not approved for whitewater paddling in Canada
name: Mustang Survival Khimera 22 Hybrid PFD - Unisex
